title: OpenAI cybersecurity grant program
summary: OpenAI has launched a $1 million Cybersecurity Grant Program to enhance AI-powered cybersecurity capabilities and promote discussions on AI and cybersecurity. The program aims to empower defenders, measure the effectiveness of AI models in cybersecurity, and foster comprehensive discussions on the challenges and opportunities in this field. OpenAI is seeking project proposals that focus on practical applications of AI in defensive cybersecurity, and preference will be given to projects that have a clear plan for licensing or distribution for public benefit. Grants will be awarded in increments of $10,000 USD. Offensive-security projects will not be considered for funding.
